website_summaries.verdict: All the benefits of Coleman's classic Quickbed, but with a comfortable, luxurious pillowtop.
pros: Queen-sized inflatable Quickbed with removable, washable cover
Double-high height makes getting in and out of bed easier
Constructed with heavy-duty PVC and 35 comfort coils
Features a three-layer design and an Airtight System that locks in air
cons: Large size and height makes it difficult to find leaks

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this purely based on reviews. I needed it while waiting on my furniture to arrive and used it for several weeks as my bed. The double mattress is a wonderful feature. It is raised off of the ground enough to make it feel like a real bed. The air pump works well and the bed didn't need to be topped off with air often. The only feature I wasn't impressed with was the "pillow top" which didn't offer any extra comfort. It did however keep the sheet from sliding around too much. A standard queen fitted sheet worked well. Overall a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Burleson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to use as a guest bed for my aging parents to use on a visit, thinking a taller air mattress would work better for them than my pre-existing basic air mattress. It seemed to work very well - I've slept on it myself since then and it's very firm. You almost forget you're on an air mattress! Holds air well and the built-in pump is awesome. A little bulky for traveling so this will primarily be used as an occasional guest bed and it is perfect for that.
customer_reviews.author: B. Kehoe

customer_reviews.title: GOOD DEAL!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I was going camping with the grandkids. I weigh over 250, so me and the misses slept on this. now since I used it in the camp grounds, the grand kids have used it around here. SO HAVE I. other than the noise of rubber squeaking.. this is a very comfortable air mattress. Hold air nice also.. still very firm in the morning, did not add air for a couple days
customer_reviews.author: John Hasapes

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase made to date
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase made to date. When visiting grand kids, the oldest always loses her room to grandma. I always feel terrible so best answer was to bring my own bed. The visit was 7 days and the bed was super comfortable. Easy to put up and put away
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia J. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great for indoors, not so much for
customer_reviews.text: This is great for indoor use. It was one of the most supportive air mattresses I have ever used, even after slightly deflated to soften it. When fully inflated, it's very firm, but still soft on top with the pad. I did take this on an extended camping trip, which was a mistake for a few reasons. The height means there is not much vertical space in dome tents (even large ones). I purchased a camping battery that had an outlet that can handle 100W peak, but the pump drew too much power. Another power source was needed to get it inflated. I'd like to see a reduced power (and slower) mode for outdoor or off grid use.
customer_reviews.author: BMM

customer_reviews.title: 4 WEEKS INFLATED AND STILL NO LEAKS
customer_reviews.text: This review is for the mattress with the removable quilted cover. We have used this several times and never had to add air. NO LEAKS! At the moment it has been inflated for about a month. We had to let some air out because it was too firm for us. You can inflate this so it is incredibly firm. I have not had to re-inflate it since we inflated it.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: fantastic to sleep on
customer_reviews.text: fantastic to sleep on..we are in between beds..having a difficult time selecting. we've been sleeping on our Coleman. easy peasy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Hugi

customer_reviews.title: Best one we've tried to date
customer_reviews.text: Durable, comfortable, onboard pump. We use mattresses like this when the kids and grandkids visit for holidays. We've only used this one a few times but it seems better made than the cheaper brands, most of which we have tried and soon discarded after they developed leaks in unpatchable places. If this continues to perform as expected it will definitely be our go-to brand for any future purchases.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great extra bed
customer_reviews.text: What a novel idea. They have come up with a zip-on mattress pad to make this a more comfortable bed. This is such a terrific bed for extra family or friends - I enjoy mine when my young granddaughter visits - we can cuddle and still have plenty of room for good, comfortable sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. love the zip-off topper
customer_reviews.text: Best air mattress I have ever owned. it's easy to set up and take down. I bought to use with my son who was home on leave for 3 weeks and he liked how easy it was to adjust the firmness of the mattress. The thickness of the mattress makes it able to hold a fitted sheet and the topper keeps you from sweating. It's a little tricky getting it back in the box for storage, but we were able to figure it out.
customer_reviews.author: bjm1210

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: This air mattress is the best I’ve ever had! It inflated and deflated quickly. It’s firm and comfy! I used it for a weekend camping trip and I didn’t have to add any air to it the whole time!! It’s high off the ground and looks and feels like a real mattress! Totally worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer D.

customer_reviews.title: but my 30 year old son saw it and he was in love he just said it looses air a little faster ...
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it i did buy it for guess .but my 30 year old son saw it and he was in love he just said it looses air a little faster than he would like.i did get to try it out for a min and it felt like a real bed i guess i will be buying a second one soon.
customer_reviews.author: Robin1

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress holds up very well
customer_reviews.text: I order this mattress for a friend who came to live with me while they get back in their feet, and she has been sleeping in it for over six months without any problems, I'm very happy with this air mattress, have had other ones in the past and they didn't last a week, so lets hope it it lasts until she's back on her own
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I just moved into a new apartment, and this is my bed until I can get a more permanent piece of furniture. I've been pleasantly surprised at how comfortable this is. Honestly, it could easily be a long-term solution, were it not for the potential that heavy use might cause it to spring a leak at some point, and I'd awaken to find myself on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Tony 0625

customer_reviews.title: Holds air all night.
customer_reviews.text: Took this camping for 4 nights and it's the best mattress I've used. I can sit on the very edge to put my shoes on and it doesn't give at all. Topped off the air before bed each night, but really couldn't even tell it had lost any by morning. Very firm and comfortable all night long.
customer_reviews.author: Roguewar

customer_reviews.title: Extra height is worthwhile
customer_reviews.text: Really comfortable. Sits high, so much easier to get in and out of. No leakage. High quality workmanship. We love the internal pump. We've only used it once so far, but if we have any problems with it in the future, I will edit my post to let people know.
customer_reviews.author: Sonador

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and easy to use. Surprised I was able to sleep on it. Had several couples staying at my home and gave up my bedroom...inflated and slept in our entertainment room...wasnt bad at all
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Frank

customer_reviews.title: a good bed for the price
customer_reviews.text: very durable, I've used once for almost a week solid, it didn't lose much air like the other reviews said. i topped it off a little after night number 3 but that's it. i slept alone in it so i can't say how it would be for 2 people. price was good and overall I'm happy
customer_reviews.author: teresa s

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: By far, the most comfortable air mattress I've owned. I'm a big guy and it comfortably sleeps two. I don't mind camping so much now.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Wayne Martin

customer_reviews.title: Best Air Bed Purchase Ever
customer_reviews.text: Using this for a year and it still hasn't lost any air. Best air mattress purchase ever and now it's gone down in price. If your looking for an air bed than this is it. Stay away from the cheap brands. I've been sleeping on this nightly over 14 months. Battle tested if you know what I mean and still holding up. The only con is it makes noise when moving around but what air mattress doesn't.
customer_reviews.author: Slick Deal

customer_reviews.title: Was able to get more out of this than my ...
customer_reviews.text: Was able to get more out of this than my last one but still had a hole in it by the end of the first month of use.
customer_reviews.author: J. T.

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my elderly parents' guest room. Daughter and her boyfriend slept on it, Christmas visit, and said it was great. Was very easy to inflate and was surprised a regular guest fitted sheet worked on it.
customer_reviews.author: Alanvi

customer_reviews.title: We have let another couple borrow it and they seemed to really like it! It was super easy to set up ...
customer_reviews.text: We hope to take this camping but haven't been able to yet. We have let another couple borrow it and they seemed to really like it! It was super easy to set up and held it's air really great. Glad we picked this one!
customer_reviews.author: SA Brown

customer_reviews.title: Impressive air mattress
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS AMAZING! I am so impressed with this mattress. It is high for an air mattress, super easy to set up and take down and super durable. Three kids haven't ruined it yet!
customer_reviews.author: Keri

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and great for someone who rolls around all night
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and great for someone who rolls around all night, even when my partner is sleeping with me it transfers little of the movement.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not stay inflated
customer_reviews.text: The built in air pump leaks air so the mattress will not stay inflated. Very disappointing, otherwise the removable top would make this great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: This didn't last two months before a leak developed, and now it cannot be returned. I am out $140.00... Hence, Walmart or Sears would be a better option for purchasing an air mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn19

customer_reviews.title: This made camping so much better! Very comfortable and I am not a fan ...
customer_reviews.text: This made camping so much better! Very comfortable and I am not a fan of blow up mattresses. This was inflated and deflated fast. Used indoor as well for house guests and they commented the comfort level was great as well. Worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle K. Root

customer_reviews.title: A well-.made Coleman product.
customer_reviews.text: We needed an extra bed for guests. This turned out to be very comfortable and so east to inflate and repack the next day. Super thick. Lost only minimal amount of air.
customer_reviews.author: Milt

customer_reviews.title: heavyduty
customer_reviews.text: You can inflate with a 300lb person on the mattress
customer_reviews.author: edeboss

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy Satisfied everyone
customer_reviews.text: I knew that Coleman would be a reliable product. all guest were very happy with the night sleep on my Coleman quilted air mattress. Best Buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It functions just like an inexpensive inflatable bed.
customer_reviews.text: They need to stabilize the bottom so it does not balloon. After several uses it stretches, get soft and the bottom balloons and rolls. Letting it rest for a day. Deflating then reinflating helps but definitely not OK for a week long camping trip.
customer_reviews.author: CHUCK

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good!
customer_reviews.text: After four nights’ usage as a guest bed, I’ve been very happy with this mattress. Inflation / deflation couldn’t be easier. It’s surprising how firm the mattess is when fully inflated. You can sit on the edge of it and tie your shoes. I haven’t experienced the air loss noted by a few reviewers and hopefully won’t.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey

customer_reviews.title: Our 2nd guest room
customer_reviews.text: Easy up, great for company, was staying a night and stayed a full week
customer_reviews.author: Virginia

customer_reviews.title: Does not hold the air
customer_reviews.text: Used air mattress for only the 2nd time, the mattress is not staying inflated. Extremely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Air mattress
customer_reviews.text: This was the easiest to set up and take down aor mattress. I have owned.
customer_reviews.author: R. Arredondo

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly comfortable and the easiest air mattress to inflate AND deflate (hello reverse pump!) BUT sprung a leak on the first use, indoors on clean floors with a 100lb guest.. shouldn’t have happened.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Purchased new, received dirty
customer_reviews.text: Mattress is fine but came covered in hair of some kind
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: This mattress has great support and I don’t have to keep inflating it. It is so comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Cohenour

customer_reviews.title: Lasts forever
customer_reviews.text: We use this for camping. We bought one 13 years ago and the motor lasted 10 years. Great news is you can still use it when you don't have power. Totally worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and easily refillable
customer_reviews.text: It is quite comfortable as an air mattress goes. Guests who have used it has said it loses a bit of air at night but it is easy to refill.
customer_reviews.author: SG

customer_reviews.title: Guests like it.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Replaced a Never Flat bed. Guests like this one better.
customer_reviews.author: Dianna L. Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress!
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable and easy to blow up and take down!
customer_reviews.author: Asha Hoover

customer_reviews.title: Size incorrect
customer_reviews.text: I just used the air mattress I purchased at Christmas and while I ordered a queen and the package said queen it is only a double.
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: My son took this to school for the summer and ...
customer_reviews.text: My son took this to school for the summer and he has not had an issue in the first 6 weeks....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bed, very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great bed, very comfortable. Inflates quickly and love the convenience of the built in pump. The storage bag is large so you don't have to fold the bed into a perfect square.
customer_reviews.author: romi12

customer_reviews.title: Came defective
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in July brought it out of the package, pumped it up for the first time tonight for guests and it has a hole in it. Pretty ridicilous plus my return by has expired so basically $119 in the garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Krysti Nash

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We have only used this for one long weekend of camping so far but it worked pefectly.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Terrific air mattress
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrific air mattress. Very comfortable and easy to inflate sand deflate.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa S

customer_reviews.title: Noisy
customer_reviews.text: The mattress inflates readily...nice height. The noise from the mattress cover onto the mattress is unbearable. I have put a fleece blanket in between which softens the sound. Not as comfortable as a real bed...but a good option.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry P.

customer_reviews.title: Great bed!
customer_reviews.text: Bed was great quality but lost a little air during the night. Plenty big for two average size adults. Maybe not for very tall people.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy..!
customer_reviews.text: Actually bought 2 of these Coleman beds because I have 3 grown children and they always fight over the one we have..now they all have there own...problem solved...great bed...!

customer_reviews.title: THE best air mattress
customer_reviews.text: THE best air mattress. I have gone through 3+ air mattresses in the past year. Everything from The constant pump to battery and this one held all the air and was firm even the first night.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is an easy to use mattress with a built in pump. Blows up/deflates within 2min. Comfortable.

customer_reviews.title: No complaints
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Received on time, as advertised and well packaged. Used once so-far and no complaints.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, inflates quickly and removable cover make this a great buy.

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase!
customer_reviews.text: We have only had this air mattress for about 2 months. We have used it about 4 times. Holds air through the night and no issues thus far.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.text: We love this mattress! Super easy to inflate and deflate. Very comfortable. Only issue is that it's quite heavy to tote.

customer_reviews.title: Great Air Bed
customer_reviews.text: Can only say that we used it for 5 nights. My daughter-in-law had to add a bit of air after 3 nights, but her & son stated it was quite comfortable.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice air mattress to have at home for my grandchildren when they sleep over.

customer_reviews.text: Great air mattress! Really stands up even under heavy weight people. Comfortable too. I like the zip off "pillow top" (although not very pillowy. VERY SQUEAKY however when you turn over. So if you are super restless or a light sleeper this may not be for you

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: Good my nephews kept jumping on it like it was a real bed and it took the beating

customer_reviews.text: Great bed. The pump works quickly both to inflate and deflate. It is comfortable and sturdy.

customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and only time will tell if it will last. We slept on it for a week and other than being closer to the ground, we were more than comfortable.

customer_reviews.title: A Comfortable Air Mattress
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and take down. Comfortable to sleep on.

customer_reviews.title: Suitable for Adults / Easy to set up and use.
customer_reviews.text: The height is great, the sleep-side cover is nice, and the bed was "very comfortable" according to our guests for whom we used this for two nights. Easier to use and set up, plus the height is much better, than another good blow-up bed that we thought was great and that got a lot of use. Now, thought, I will probably order another Coleman for adults because of the height. I especially like the built-in pump. The other brand has a good pump, but keeping up with it is a pain.

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Used it four times and it continues to work as expected. Would buy again.

The mattress was deflated pretty much in one hour. I've made this investment and pulling out more money from my pocket expecting something with high quality.

customer_reviews.title: A high quality air bed in every way.
customer_reviews.text: This is an extremely nice air bed. It holds the air great and with the built in electric pump makes the occasional minor refill a breeze. It's a firm bed but comfortable to boot. It looks very attractive with the beautiful pillowtop. I highly recommend it.

customer_reviews.title: It was comfortable during the night
customer_reviews.text: Second time using it-I unzipped the top cloth and washed/dried per the instructions. It shrunk so much that it now won't fit on the bed. Went to fold the bed up and put it back in the bag, both zippers on the bag broke. Also had to re inflate each morning or evening before I got back on it. It was comfortable during the night.

customer_reviews.text: Horrible mattress! I was surprised because we have been camping for 20 years, and buy all Coleman products. It inflated fine, but within hours was completely flat and unable to use. Will definitely not be buying another Coleman mattress.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for company

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed in this
customer_reviews.text: So, we have had this mattress for six months, and used it a total of maybe a dozen times. All times have been inside. The mattress is leaking from one of the seams because it is about flat by the end of the night and I can not find a single hole anywhere in he the mattress. Very disappointed in this. Hopefully Coleman will stand behind the product when I call them.
customer_reviews.author: Michael R.

customer_reviews.title: Love that the pump is concealed and it will also ...
customer_reviews.text: Love that the pump is concealed and it will also take the air out. Easy to set up, easy to inflate, easy to deflate. I am very happy with this mattress.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It makes too much noise when we sleep and move

customer_reviews.title: If you're buying an air mattress this is the one you want!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic air mattress in fact I went out and bought another one shortly after for a 2nd home! Being able to plug it in and automatically inflate and deflate it is so much better than the old-style air mattresses and this holds air very very well. It's so convenient to take this out when I have guests instead of a large bulky bed taking up room 100% of the time. I would definitely recommend this as well as I want again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Linzer

customer_reviews.title: 8 out of 10
customer_reviews.text: Bought for daughter to use, she gave it an 8 out of 10 for comfort :). Easy to inflate and deflate, a bonus extra bed when needed.

customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, however, the quilted cover ripped off one half of the bed. It lasted 2 months, but now it has a big hole on top from crawling into bed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Coleman SupportRest Elite Double-High Airbed with Quilted Top, Queen
product_meta.description: Give your guests a luxurious, restful night of sleep with the Coleman SupportRest Elite Quilted Top Double-High Airbed. This air mattress has a removable, washable quilted top that is as soft and comfortable as a traditional bed. Equipped with a built-in SwiftRise pump, it rapidly inflates in under three minutes. Once the mattress is inflated, the AirTight system and Double Lock valve work to prevent leaks and maintain the desired level of firmness. With its Support Lock reinforced construction, this inflatable bed helps provide a more stable sleeping surface to promote all-night comfort. Its double-high height makes getting into and out of the bed easier. When you're ready to pack up, you can use the pump to deflate your air mattress completely for easier packing. An included carry bag makes storage and transport simple.
feature_bullets: Inflatable air mattress features a quilted top for a luxurious, comfortable feel
SwiftRise pump inflates the bed in under 3 minutes
Double-high height makes getting in and out of bed easier; supports up to 600 pounds
AirTight system is factory-tested to be leak-free
Deflates fully and comes with a carry bag for compact storage
